meanings.definition: A large farm, especially in the western US, where cattle or other animals are raised.
meanings.sent1: The ranchos had many cows and horses.
meanings.sent2: We visited a ranchos during our vacation in Texas.
meanings.sent3: The ranchos decided to have a dance party for the cows.
meanings.sent4: The vast ranchos stretched out like a patchwork quilt under the setting sun.
meanings.sent5: The smell of hay and animals filled the air at the ranchos.

meanings.definition: A type of Mexican food consisting of a soft tortilla rolled around a filling, typically of beans or ground or shredded beef.
meanings.sent1: I ordered a delicious ranchos for lunch.
meanings.sent2: My mom makes the best ranchos with beans and cheese.
meanings.sent3: The ranchos wore a tiny sombrero and danced on the plate.
meanings.sent4: The flavors in the ranchos exploded in my mouth like fireworks.
meanings.sent5: The warm aroma of the ranchos made my stomach growl in anticipation.
